mapper.select: SELECT up.*, ui.*, p.*, tu.* FROM unidadprivada up INNER JOIN unidadinmobiliaria ui ON up.id_uinmobiliaria=ui.id_uinmobiliaria LEFT JOIN persona_up pup ON up.id_uprivada = pup.id_uprivada AND pup.id_tipo_relacion = '1' LEFT JOIN persona p ON pup.id_persona = p.id_persona INNER JOIN tipounidad tu ON up.id_tipo_unidad = tu.id ORDER BY up.id_uprivada asc

SELECT up.*, ui.*, p.*, tu.* FROM unidadprivada up INNER JOIN unidadinmobiliaria ui ON up.id_uinmobiliaria=ui.id_uinmobiliaria LEFT JOIN persona_up pup ON up.id_uprivada = pup.id_uprivada AND pup.id_tipo_relacion = '1' LEFT JOIN persona p ON pup.id_persona = p.id_persona INNER JOIN tipounidad tu ON up.id_tipo_unidad = tu.id WHERE up.id_uprivada=#{id} ORDER BY up.id_uprivada asc
